Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is much easier to use on demand. Whereas, receiving feedback from a teacher is a much slower process.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Gen AI is very specific, I don't think I have yet asked a question personally to my teacher about my work
